text: Ra mominaharule bhandachanh ki â€˜â€˜kunai surah (surata) kina avatarita gari'ena? Tara jaba kunai prasta artha bha'eko surah avatarita huncha ra tyasama jihadako varnana huncha, ta tapa'ile dekhanuhuncha ki juna manisaharuko hrdayama (kapatako) roga cha tiniharu tapa'itira yasari dekhdachan, jasto tyasa manisako drsti huncha jasamathi mrtyuko murcha cha'eko cha. Uniharuko nimti bahutai ramro thiyo
